website_summaries.verdict: The Zipbuds Pro Mic is a unique, powerful set of earphones with a cable that morphs into a zipper.
pros: Powerful audio performance with boosted, distortion-free bass
Zipper design allows for a more secure fit and tangle-free storage
cons: Heavily boosted bass not for purists
Highs can often sound too bright

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: The zipper idea is a good one, they stay in place better than any other in ear headphones I've had, with less tangling. Also a very high quality sound and feel. Two caveats: 1. The version with the built in microphone does not seem to have any noise cancelling functionality, which I was led to believe when it was included with other such headphones when I searched for "noise cancelling in ear headphones". 2. And I wouldn't use them for working out, I don't think they'd stay in. I use them for studying in a large classroom, with a white noise app to block out background sounds, and they're great for that.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: The virtue or ruggedness.
customer_reviews.text: I have lived with these rugged earbuds, for a while now, carelessly taking them in and out of my briefcase almost daily for my subway ride. No tangles, good fit, decent-looking. I'd rate the sound good, but they come up short compared to my Audio-Technica ATH ANC23 QuietPoint - Headphones at $41, which are more delicate. Bass is a bit weak (use your equalizer) and the treble less than natural. Unlike the Audio-Technica, these don't have any active noise canceling as advertised, other than the benefits of having your ear hole plugged. All that said, I would still buy them again because they are so sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Bought mainly for the MIC and not having to deal with tangles, works great for both!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these a few weeks back because I needed a good headset to drive with that had a high quality mic on them. These caught my attention with the noise cancelling mic and good reviews, so I gave them a go. Sure enough the mic is a good quality mic. I no longer hear others on my call telling me that they cant hear me or asking me if I am driving with the windows down which is good. My truck is pretty loud driving on the freeway with offroad tires and yet these do a great job cancelling that noise out. Good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Bornshallow

customer_reviews.title: Road Warriors
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these headphones for about a month now and can report that they are excellent for commuting. I frequently have to stuff my headphones into a pocket and having to untangle them is a huge pain in the butt. These earbud headphones live up to their promise - zip them up, wrap them around your hand, stuff them in a pocket and they pretty much don't get tangled. I paired these headphones with Comply Tx-500 Isolation tips and the sound quality is excellent. I've only used the microphone a couple of times but I got no complaints when I made calls.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent at noise cancelling
customer_reviews.text: Excellent at noise cancelling. Perhaps because of that, phone calls sometimes make me feel like I'm in a vacuum. The mic has received varying reviews from parties on the other end of phone calls, but mostly positive. The variability might be related to where I position the mic (normal), but it also might have to do with the zippered wire picking up sound when rubbing against clothing because its weight generates a little friction. I now tend to hold the cord slightly away from my body when speaking and that addresses both the mic and friction issues. The zippering does keep them from tangling.
customer_reviews.author: 6-StringAcoustic

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have been through more earbuds than I can count, and I generally buy cheap ones with the expectation that I will have lost or destroyed them before too long. This is my first time making an investment, and I'm pretty excited. It's early days yet, but the zip function seems to work really well to keep the cord from tangling, and the seal made by the tips is fantastic--I might even wear them around without playing anything just as silencers. I was a little worried about the weight of the zip pulling the earbuds out, but they feel pretty secure--I like the more ergonomic shape.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Murray

customer_reviews.title: Good concept -- great sound
customer_reviews.text: The Zipbuds stay untangled and that's a good thing. The sounds is very good, with a little more bottom than expected, but nice ambient highs. The zipper do-jiggy is a little cumbersome, but it serves a useful purpose. As someone else mentioned, when the music is off, the noise the cord makes when rubbing against cloth or hoodie is deafening -- but once the music begins, you don't hear that at all. Overall, recommended - great price, too.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Innovative and Sleek
customer_reviews.text: The Zipbuds are still pretty new to me, so I have yet to use them in a variety of situations. The top zipper portion of them really does seem to avoid tangles, though the lower half, made with a thicker cord -- I have still manged to get a bit tangled up -- though it is not nearly as difficult to undo as a standard set of ear buds. Sometimes, the pulley-part of the zipper gets crooked, and therefore hard to pull down... but overall, I like them (and have gotten complements on them). Sound is decent and it makes carrying around buds a bit less of a hassle!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Works great for calls or music
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these earbuds to go with my iPhone 5c. I was intrigued with the zipper idea and it is really awesome. You can easily adjust how snug or loose you want the Y part of the zipper wire and it doesn't feel heavy to me at all. The buds sit securely in your ears and effectively block external noise. My mom who has trouble hearing me on a landline could hear me just find using these with my cell. I highly recommend these earbuds and plan on getting a second pair for the car.
customer_reviews.author: WARainGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: The buds angle a little to sit in the ear snug. They fit comfortably and securely. The sound quality is very good. One of the biggest selling points for me was the zip feature which will help keep the left and right ear cables from snagging on equipment at the gym like my old ones did. The only negative is the microphone sits kind of high. I haven't used the mic yet, but it sits much higher than my last two pairs of headphones. This may not be a big deal, just something I'm not used to. Overall, these are really nice and I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Bella

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Great customer service also!!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great headphones and they come with a warranty!! Bonus!! I bought these a couple of months ago and was immediately impressed that they weren't too heavy or bulky. They don't get tangled, they have good sound quality and I love that they have a built in mic so I can take a call or talk to text. I had to contact customer support for a minor issue and the response time and courteousness alone would get me to buy this product again!! I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Yes, they do actually zip....
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many mic'd headphones. What's good about these: -The chord mechanism is sturdy and doesn't tangle -The mic is located close to your mouth, so you don't have to hold it up to talk into it -The sound quality is solid for the price point -They do zip, and that is strangely satisfying What's not good: -A little bulky for running/exercising -They were not advertised to have one, but volume buttons would make this a complete score
customer_reviews.author: Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Crisp sound. BUY THEM...YOU WON"T REGRET!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this earbuds !! the sound is crisp and the bass is the bomb!!! the company customer service is really great too. I hope they sell a lot of them. they are better than most of the expensive brands out there..the tangle free cable really works too...I will purchase more as gifts!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cesar E. Abrego

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've tested out dozens of headphones at various price ranges, from $15 Sony/Panasonics to $300 UE SuperFi's - Yamaha, Brainwaves, VModa, A-T, VSonic, etc. Some I love, and maybe even love more, but few give the absolute bang for the buck that these do. Zipper aside (and it is a great feature) - these are just great sounding headphones, along with being super comfortable at the same time. Seriously no reason to at least have these as a backup pair to your super premium buds. Huge fan.
customer_reviews.author: GFunkEra

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality, poor design.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones took no warm up time and sounded great right out of the gate. I'm not an audiophile by any means, but know good sound when I hear it. It hits all the highs and lows, but won't satisfy the bass heads. I like my sound crisp and clean so these were perfect for me. I do have to say the zipper function really doesn't let it tangle. However, it adds so much weight to the headphones the fall out fairly easily. I don't run with them and use the most comfortable ear pieces, but if I'm walking down the stairs they will fall out. Good for desk drawer headphones but not much else.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Great buds for the money
customer_reviews.text: These buds have a surprisingly good range of sound and clarity; they almost match the much-more-expensive Klipsch IMAGE S4 In-Ear Enhanced Bass Noise-Isolating Headphones that I used to have, but wore out. They fit well with three different options for the buds, and the zipper does a great job keeping them from getting tangled - as advertised. The one cons, though minor, is that the zipper does make the buds feel a bit 'heavy', but not so much that they fall out or tire my ears. I'm pleased with the purchase overall.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany. Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! They just never tangle
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! They just never tangle. I used to hate using my other earbuds, there was always an untangling ritual before use. The zipbuds, however, have made me retire the ritual! The sound is also surprisingly great! It is very unusual to get such good sound out of a pair of earbuds. I've gotten many compliments and inquiries as to what kind of earbuds they are. They are perfect for the gym. I can finally tune out the distractions. They stay put in my ear and are very comfortable to wear for an extended period of time. I would highly recommend these to anyone that wants a great sounding, comfortable, durable and tangle free earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: LTJesse

customer_reviews.title: decent pair of headphones
customer_reviews.text: no issues with sound or voice quality. i am not a big fan of in-ear buds, but these ones fit fine. i didnt need to swap out the standard inserts for the other two sizes (smaller/larger). the zipper section adds noticeable weight and can get in the way a lot more than other headphones, but it definitely wont tangle. ive only used them for a month or two so i cant comment on durability (my major gripe with most headphones).
customer_reviews.author: Samwize the brave

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: I generally don't review my purchases but and compelled to do so with these ear buds. The company markets them as a comfortable fit for small ears. NOT SO...my recent 4 hour flight left me with a sore neck...I couldn't chew or move my head without the ear buds falling out. Granted I suppose my ear canal is smaller that most but if you advertise your product as, Zipbuds PRO does, my expectation is that they will fit. As a matter of fact their advertising states " ComfortFit2 Technology: Angled ear bud shape stays in your ear no matter what". On a positive note they don't tangle but they are bulky to roll up and stow. POSITIVE: they don't tangle
customer_reviews.author: John Wasilewski

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully crisp sound and no tangles.
customer_reviews.text: I've always had issues, like others, with tangles headphones so I wanted to replace mine with a high quality set of earbuds and take care of that problem as well. These did the trick nicely. I would definitely recommend getting an extension cable if you use these at your bedside. The earbuds are angled which caught me off guard but they fit into my ears nicely. The sounds is excellent. Nice and punchy with great bass response and crisp highs. I would recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: D. Waters

customer_reviews.title: -Sound quality is really good -even though there is added weight to the chord ...
customer_reviews.text: -Sound quality is really good -even though there is added weight to the chord they stay in my ears comfortably when running and cycling Quality stuff but not durable enough for me, I broke the zipper and Jack in less then a month. ...being said I put my phone in my back pocket with them plugged in. also when Jammed into my pocket they tangle a bit ... not much though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Orlando

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I really like these because I use them at work all the time and sometimes i have to get up real fast so i just toss them in the drawer with a bunch of other stuff and I can pull them back out when i need them and not have to spend half an hour untangling the cord. The sounds are pretty average but they are noise canceling which is great so i can tune out everyone around me especially that i work on a factory floor and its pretty loud at all times. Would def. get another one to throw in my purse for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great Design and Sound with Some Unfortunate "Zipper Noise"
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm impressed with these headphones. The sound is great and the zipper design definitely keeps things from turning into a tangled mess. However, if you're moving around the zipper portion of the cable will transmit a lot of noise into your headphones if it is rubbing up against anything. Since I primarily use these for studying or air travel, I'm not too concerned but this could be a significant issue for some, especially if you're going to use this while exercising.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brogan

customer_reviews.title: Zipbuds are not a gimmic, they are the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: With all the different famous names backing these, I thought they were going to be more of a gimmic than what they claim to be. All I have to say is WOW! They feel well made and not cheap like 90% of all the other headsets under $40. My LG headset broke a few months back after 3 years and I have struggled to find something high quality, with decent sound and an in-line mic. I do not have to look any longer, these are perfect! My wife said the bass sounds like you're riding in a car with a nice sound system. Very pleased!! Thank you Zipbuds and Amazon for helping find exactly what I have been looking for!!
customer_reviews.author: muZe

customer_reviews.title: Zipbuds pro
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty nice with sound and comfort. The zipper (wire) is a tiny bit heavy like everyone else said but they never fall out. They come with different ear size buds too. Just noting that if you have a lifeproof (like me), they won't fit. Instead of taking the case off I just use the headphone waterproof jack. Also I wish the button on the wire had a volume control not just a mic mute.
customer_reviews.author: Fantasÿe

customer_reviews.title: Finally Tangle Free
customer_reviews.text: Nothing is more annoying than taking forever to unwind a pair of headphones when you just want to listen to music. I've been searching for a tangle free headphone while retaining great sound quality and haven't had any luck until i found this. This has made my life easier by never having to worry about untangling headphones when i stuff it in my pocket and it also has great sound quality. Great product overall!
customer_reviews.author: DjliuRmX

customer_reviews.title: Good, expect an update after i owned them a couple months
customer_reviews.text: The recording from the mic is good, it even picks my voice pretty well. (I have a deep voice, and the microphone being able to pick it up through that little hole without getting garbled is impressive). The bass response of the headphones are spectacular for earbuds. Yet, they aren't bass-heavy. Closer to over the ear headphones than most other earbuds I have owned. The zipper feature is useful- can't tangle them unless you do it on purpose. Previous earbuds would tangle as soon as they were put in a pocket. Anyways, this is initial testing. I will come back in July to report if they are at least slightly durable.
customer_reviews.author: James D Fuller JR

customer_reviews.title: Great sound! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I've lately been stuck between wanting bluetooth headphones so I can be free of tangled wires but wanting better sound that only a wired connection can bring. This very innovative design bridges the gap! The sound is very balanced (not too bass heavy) with very clear mids. I love the zipped design as it keep things much more tidy. I love this product and kick myself for paying so much more in the past. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Julio

customer_reviews.title: Tangle-Free & Sound Suppressing; Great at the Gym
customer_reviews.text: I decided to give Zipbuds PRO a try after years of frustration with ear buds that failed after 2-3 months, tangled readily, and did not filter out the gym's choice of music. Zipbuds have already scored on two of the three counts. I've only had them for ten days, but they appear to be durable. I'm finally able to listen to my music while running or working out at the gym without the background noise of the gym's choice of music. Thank you Zipbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Shore John

customer_reviews.title: Great listening for the price! Don't tangle!
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds really do sound great! Take a few minutes to choose the ear piece that fits you the best as that will really improve your listening. They do noise cancel as well as any headphones can, and the only negative part is probably that the zipper parts rub together and you can hear that when you move around. Love these though, great for the price and LOVE that they don't tangle!
customer_reviews.author: H. Bence

customer_reviews.title: Zipbuds PRO are great!
customer_reviews.text: I thought i'd try the Zipbuds pro because i'm really tired of my earbuds tangling up. I thought the zippered concept might help this issue. I also wanted an earbud that would block ambient noises especially while I am resting. Well, I opened the package and used them right away. The buds come with 3 ear sizes, and the largest worked well. With them in my ears, and music on low, I could escape into my own world. The zipper was good, protecting my lines from tangling. It felt a bit heavy hanging midline, though. All in all, I think they are a good product, and I'd buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: David Dohi

customer_reviews.title: Zipbuds PRO mic Never Tangle Zipper Earbuds with Noise Canceling Mic/Remote, Black
customer_reviews.text: I like these headphones. My ears are so small the fall out a lot. I gave them a four because around the second week of using them, the end of the cord has unraveled and is sticking out from the thread. I wanted to return them but the new ones I brought have static in them and they had a 4 1/2 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: ABEY

customer_reviews.title: These are the best headphones i've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones i've ever owned. I've owned a pair before but my cat chewed on the earpiece so I had to replace them. But the sound quality is amazing, very comparable if not better to the Apple headphones. The no tangle wire is a life saver since I usually just throw my headphones into my bag and they also have a speaker so you can answer calls as well
customer_reviews.author: AntonaMarie Speckman

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant innovation to stop earbud tangling
customer_reviews.text: Who would have thought that a zipper could solve that annoying problem with tangled earbuds? I like them. The sound is as good as comparable earbuds. The zipper is well made and easy to use. Only slight complaint is that the zipper is somewhat heavier than normal earbud cords so they want to pull out of your ears. Using the right size buds should solve that problem.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Craig

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I think of that.......
customer_reviews.text: The zipper function is a GREAT idea and helps to keep things 'neat and tiddie'. The 'buds' come with multiple silicone earpieces for a custom fit that is comfortable for extended listening sessions. As for sound quality, I wouldn't call these 'audiophile' by any stretch of the imagination, but for casual MP3 listening they are more than adequate and voice conversations are clear and distinct. I've not had any complaints from callers reporting that they had any difficulty hearing me, but wind noise could be an issue as these do not feature any sort of active noise suppression. Finally, they appear to be well made and should hold-up well under reasonable, normal use.
customer_reviews.author: M. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a good set of headphones for the price ($30). I find the zipper to be hokey, but the construction seems good; the wires are cloth-wrapped, which I like. It's has a straight audio jack, which I also prefer to the alternative. They are a bit heavier than headphones that I've had before, and I found that I needed to loop the earbuds around my ear to keep them from coming out as I walk. Also, "noise cancelling" is an oversell - I don't know of a way to get noise cancelling through a standard audio jack (with no battery pack).
customer_reviews.author: Rob Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, funky with the zipper
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some "noise canceling" headphones to use while riding on my motorcycle (it's loud and I have to wear ear plugs anyway) and these were some of the first that returned from my search. The sound is excellent, especially for the price. Nice bass with clear high end. The zipper part is a nice idea I think, but as others say it does make the headphones heavier. I don't mind the weight because it keeps the cords from blowing around. I did notice that there is more noise from bumping the cords versus other headphones. I wish there were volume buttons along with the pause play button.
customer_reviews.author: btboyd

customer_reviews.title: Great set of earbuds - only one small caveat
customer_reviews.text: Just got my Zipbuds and tested them out at work, on the bus and at home. The sound quality is GREAT, no complaints there. I have tried to tangle these guys, but short of tying a knot on purpose, I am not sure how they would tangle. I was a Boy Scout too, so I know my knots! The small caveat is that the unit is a little heavy, since there is literally a zipper running accross the length of 90% of the wire. I should say it isnt to TOO distracting, but if you want to use this unit for excercise, it might be a little too unbalanced and come out to easily. Otherwise, great pair of earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Zhiming Zhao

customer_reviews.title: Interesting and innovative concept, with one drawback
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, no tangle cord makes for a good concept. Problem is that the heavier and thicker cord makes noise when you are active. Therefore, I recommend these earbuds for listening while you are not moving. But if you intend to use these earbuds while exercising or walking, I recommend that you try another style.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R. Kibby

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic earbuds with a huge touch of innovation!
customer_reviews.text: These are really some of the most amazing, innovative pieces of audio I've ever used. They sound pretty great for being in the sub-$40 range, and the zipper feature is really just irreplaceable. My only gripe is that the mic is much too up, and sits along my jawline, often causing me to sound as if I'm mumbling so I'm going to have to dock a star for that one. Otherwise, these are really just perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Orion

customer_reviews.title: I Likes 'em
customer_reviews.text: I've only had them for 3 days now but I'm always listening to music or on the phone (on the train, grocery shopping, at work, etc).so they've seen some heavy use. I think the sound quality is A- but tweaks can be made via equalizer. The zipper really does keep them from tangling. I have spent a good 5 minutes with other headphones trying to untangle them for use and sometimes I've damaged them. Finally, the zipper is totally a conversation piece. A short conversation but a conversation nonetheless. In short, I likes 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn L. Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds that sound great and seem super durable!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a pair of earbuds that seems to meet all of my needs - great sound, buds stay firmly in my ears, and what would appear to be significant durability. The cords really DO NOT TANGLE as indicated and the zipper feature if pretty cool. Overall, great construction. Of course, the test of time will tell how these do but all indicators appear very promising.
customer_reviews.author: B. Levin

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound, Price, and Features!
customer_reviews.text: The zipbuds pro have great sound quality, Wouldn't say they are 100% tangle proof, but definitely tangle resistant....which is nice. The only downside to these is that the zipper part could be a lot longer, it should go all the way to the plug. The pros far outweigh the cons with these and are definitely worth the money, they are well constructed and the in line pause/skip/answer button is really convenient so you don't have to always remove your device to change songs or answer a call.
customer_reviews.author: D. Belt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I actually was looking more for noise canceling earbuds and ordered these accidentally. While they aren't technically noise cancelling, they do seem to "mold" to my ear and block out most sound well. The zip mechanism is really amazing and the sound of these is very good considering the price. My only complaint was the "sound" you hear when the wires rub against your chest. This is more prounced than typical headphone wires but if you aren't moving about it's not really noticeable. Also, the L and R to designate right and left is very hard to read. However, these were still a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Innovative, with great sound
customer_reviews.text: Really great product with innovative design. Really does solve the problem of tangles--which is the reason I bought it--and the sound from the buds themselves is quite good, for music, podcasts, and calls. Potential downsides for some people--the teeth on the zipper may be too high for some people, and may chafe a neck. And I would have liked to see the microphone include up and down volume clicks too. But overall, a recommended product to pair with your smartphone.
customer_reviews.author: PB Backenson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great price.
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds have nearly everything you could ask for. They seem to be made out of quality materials, the sound is great, and they sure do look spiffy. The chord is a little heavy due to the zipper mechanism, but it's nothing dramatic, and they are still very functional. They also come with three sets of earpieces to help ensure you get a nice snug fit. Working great so far, definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia E. Kimble

customer_reviews.title: Love the zip!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive! The worst part of my former fav headphones (at 3x the price) was the time I spent daily at the gym untangling them. HATED THAT! The zipper works as advertised and the ear buds go from pocket to ears in a seconds. Sounds quality seems the same as my way-more-expense former ear buds, without all the hassle. I've also used it a few times for conf. calls on my iPhone, and the mic worked great on both high-fidelity VoIP calls and lo-fi cell calls.
customer_reviews.author: DanG

customer_reviews.title: Much more than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these, I was expecting a good sounding pair of earbuds with a neat look zipper kicker. What I got... was probably the most durable headphones I've ever laid eyes on. Not only is the zipper hardy, but what I didn't expect was the rest of the cord to be made of a fabric weave. Some sort of dence material that covers the actual cord, and well adhered to the zipper. Very impressed. Also, the sound is on par with my friend's "super expensive skull candy's". Pfft, whatever. Mine are way better. Thanks zipbuds :)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: after she used them she told me that she was happy using them
customer_reviews.text: You know at first I was reluctant at buying this item for my wife, but, after she used them she told me that she was happy using them, "even gave me a big kiss". The quality of sound is great for the price and the comfort of the fit is also very nice, the style and design make it unique. So I give this Item four stars and two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: ceiba

customer_reviews.title: Zipper rubs me the wrong way
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price but there is one drawback. The hard plastic zip cord transmits sound to the speakers. So when you walk or move and the zipper rubs on your coat or shirt buttons it goes right up to your ear. These are great when you are at your desk or not moving much. I knew it did not have audio controls and I thought I could get used to it, but I'm struggling. Again, great sound for the price if you just want to set and forget your music.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Durning

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea, Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these Zipbuds for a few days now at work. I move constantly, fast, and work in a loud environment - so durability is a must. I really like the construction of the bottom-wire which connects to the jack with strong, cloth-covered wire, which is also used from the zipper up to the ear pieces themselves. The sound is great, but not perfect. It is what i expected for the money. My only complaint is that they get caught under my shirt a lot, and pull down the cords which gets irritating. I wish the zipper-handle had a little clip on it to keep them from moving around.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Billings

customer_reviews.title: a little heavy for running
customer_reviews.text: Bought them here on sale, only to find out other sites has these for a little cheaper. I do like the fact that it in theory can not be tangled, however f or running, it kind of drags on your ears and it feels like the buds will fall off since the metal zipper is a bit on the heavy side.
customer_reviews.author: LimeyLe

customer_reviews.title: bleh... good concept but not completely well thought through on complete design.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it while it worked.. then the part that wasn't a zipper that is flexible fabric got a short in the connection so I can only hear out of one ear... i just missed the warranty i think so I'm stuck with half working ear buds.. this sucks. too expensive to buy again.. bleh
customer_reviews.author: Hybridmotion

customer_reviews.title: Good Concept
customer_reviews.text: I love the zipper but the ear plugs do not fit in my ears very well. they fall out all the time when I am walking. Also since the zipper is thick I hear the noise from them. I do like them but not sure if I will continue to use them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wnukowski

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea
customer_reviews.text: They're a little expensive, but I understand due to the quality. They sound great. The microphone is ok. It's a little tinny, but works. The no-tangle feature is the reason I bought them, and they don't tangle. It would be nice if the zipper was a little smaller. Other then that, I'd buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: scottysize

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction, good sound
customer_reviews.text: These are a pair of solidly made earbuds with very good sound. It is dynamic and fits comfortably in the ear. The zipper design is ingenius....avoids all tangling. The zipper feature goes down 10" or 12" below the buds but it is enough to create a little weight that can feel like its pulling the buds, but they havent fallen out yet. I intend to use them at the gym as any other pair knot up terribly when thrown in the locker.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpoobahh

customer_reviews.title: Eh.
customer_reviews.text: These are just okay. Well, I'm just going to say it, they're ugly. And just because they zip, doesn't really keep them from tangling, it just keeps them from tangling more? Worse? I don't know, it doesn't matter. They're in my workout bag to use on the treadmill because it's cool to be ugly on the treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Shindler

customer_reviews.title: Flawed in every way
customer_reviews.text: I was buying this for the noise canceling which it doesnt have... noise isolation (fingers in your ears) is all it has... if theres any background noise the person on the other end cant hear you... Theres also nothing to prevent this from tangling and the zipper is just awkward at best...
customer_reviews.author: jnatkins

customer_reviews.title: not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I listen to audio books at night in bed and thought these would save the time that it took to unravel the regular ones when pulling them out of the drawer. Unfortunately, within three months time they became unusable after developing a short below the zipper section. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: spiritwater

customer_reviews.title: Zipbuds pro it's my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Actually i was ownedand its nice i love it but dosent last after 2 month so i have been looking for new one, i found Zipbuds pro interesting Features and good reviews, Decided to try it i like the sound quality is clear not too much bass to blow your ears and not too low nice great balance. great design very comfortable in ears for long time. but one thing is missing the volume up and down.after all good product I highly recommend. i love Zipbuds pro it's my favorite the best i ever have and i hope to last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulwahab Abushigah

customer_reviews.title: Looking to throw away money? Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: So let me begin by saying this is the second pair of zip buds I have bought. The first ones broke within a month and I assumed that was a random occurrence, it was not. My second pair also broke within a month - I take great care of the head phones, never squish them into my pocket or any mistreatment, simply wrapped them up nicely when done. Yet my careful treatment couldn't prevent the headphones from breaking - why did I waste my money on these headphones? Because no one warned me - here's me paying it back, don't buy these unless you need headphones for short term use, like while you wait for your real pair to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great earphones
customer_reviews.text: Zipbuds fit will in the ear nicely with 3 different sized attachments. The zipper is a bit heavy, but that was to be expected / the point of the product. You can't be too active as they may fall out of your ears, however its great not to have the tangles and still have good quality sound coming through.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Priore

customer_reviews.title: PROS Earbuds are quite comfortable Sound quality is good
customer_reviews.text: I just received my earbuds yesterday and have been using them at work for more or less two days now. PROS Earbuds are quite comfortable Sound quality is good; marginally better than other headphones at the same price point They have not yet tangled once, one of the major reasons for my purchase CONS A not insignificant amount of noise from the cable, comes with the territory Cord is fairly heavy, may cause buds to loosen with significant movement All in all, if you're looking for a cheap pair of buds with good sound and really can't deal with the tangles, these work well.
customer_reviews.author: John Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several pairs of Shure earbuds, and the sound from these is solid in comparison at a fraction of the price. They're comfortable and fit snug. I do get a bit of "microphoning" when the cord bounces against my chest, so they're better for stationary use. I wouldn't hesitate to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Miqs

customer_reviews.title: Different - but good
customer_reviews.text: I have used many different headphones. These are okay and unique with the zipper. I like the tangle free aspect as well as the sealed headphone jack (last three headphones I have had from different companies have split down there and pulled apart). These seem very sturdy and like they will last. Overall they are good - only had them for a week the buds don't really fit my ear and hurt after awhile but that is my ears and have a thing on soft in-ear buds but overall good.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable when using one earbud.
customer_reviews.text: I often listen with only one earbud and the weight of the zipper makes me feel like my head is locked to a chain. It gave me very annoying neck pain after only a few days. The sound quality is great, and they do not get tangled. But the comfort level is tremendously low.
customer_reviews.author: AK. Att

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money, clever design, sound is above average
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earbuds to replace a pair of skullcandy 50/50 that broke. I mainly thought the design was clever and liked what another reviewer had said about the cord being made of a rope like material. What I didn't expect was that the sound would be so loud, bass so deep, and overall sound quality so good. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: P. Berger

customer_reviews.title: ... mic so I figured they would be just as good. They were
customer_reviews.text: I have another pair without the mic so I figured they would be just as good. They were! I was pleasantly surprised at how good the mic is. I have had other brands and this is by far the best so far. I have used them for a few days and I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Audio and fit
customer_reviews.text: I almost bought a pair of earbuds at best buy and I'm glad I looked at amazon reviews before pulling the trigger and finding these. I need earbuds that work well for taking calls and have a great fit. These have worked perfectly and have much more bass than my v-moda earbuds I bought at costco. I was trying to buy another pair of those but couldn't find them at costco and the earbuds I was looking at from Best Buy were much more expensive if I wanted the same features. I am ver satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Irvin M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headphones at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are really cool. The zipper is truly unique, and the cable really does not tangle. No doubt about that. And the sound is excellent. They have a really big sound with substantial bass, especially with dance/electronica type music. Rock sounds good as well. And they really do block out everything if you choose the right earbud size. The only drawback is that the zipper inherently makes the whole thing a bit bulky, and the zipper/cord is actually pretty long, which makes me worry that they might get caught on things. I hope this nylon cabling is as sturdy as they claim, because I tend to go through headphones quickly! Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Moskovitz

customer_reviews.title: My limited music listening is also perfectly fine for my untrained ear
customer_reviews.text: I've had the Zipbuds PRO for about two weeks now and they do not tangle, which has been my biggest frustration with every other earbud I've used. I listen primarily to spoken word (podcasts, audiobooks) and the sound is perfectly acceptable for these media. My limited music listening is also perfectly fine for my untrained ear. The only complaint I have is that there is no volume control on the earbuds, requiring me to pull out my mobile device to modulate the volume. Other than that, it does just what I was looking for, provide a quick access, tangle-free way to plug into my device.
customer_reviews.author: Drzzz

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds looks very stylish, yet deliver great sound quality. I've been wearing it everyday since purchasing this and couldn't be happier for the choice. Noise canceling works great, you can't hear anything once put this on. The mic and control funcion just as well as original earbuds on iPhone. And it is not tangling at all, actually there's no way you can make it tangle! The product comes with 3 different sizes of ear bud tips, so you'll surely find an easy way to stay comfortable with it.
customer_reviews.author: codesign

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Just received them and haven't tested sound quality yet. Build quality is pretty nice, it has a nice cloth braided cable. Zipper is a little bulky. Earbuds have a nice angle to them, fit is good. Update: Just tried them out and when they work they sound pretty good. Tried to use as normal headphones (stereo) and at first had only one channel. After plugging them in and out a 6 or 7 times and wiggling a bit, I got them to keep stereo pretty consistently. Still does cut out if I wiggle the connector. Would possibly return, but need them for a trip and will give a chance to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob P.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Product
customer_reviews.text: After about a year one earbud quit working. Past the warranty and no recourse, so I am not a happy camper. I could understand it if I abused the product or "overused" it, but did neither. So, I think it is just a poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Charles T. Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: No-Hassle Convenient Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I got these earbuds after reading the favorable reviews and to replace my iPhone earbuds. Overall, I'm pretty pleased with the earbuds. The zipper design makes it it easy to stick into my pockets with out the dreaded tangles from my iPhone earbuds. The sound quality is acceptable for the price and better than the iPhone earbuds. One drawback vs. the iPhone earbuds is that the mic doesn't have the volume/track control that the iPhone earbuds do. Also, the zipper does add some heft to the earphones which is not a big deal but does take some getting used when wearing them. Overall, a solid set of earphones which does what is advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Ted S Sheen

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Microphone, ended up loving for the sound as well
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace some stock Samsung headphones. I use my headphones to make calls at work and needed something with a good mic. I actually used these today as I stained my deck and was very happy with the sound as well as the call quality. Would definitely recommend and I know I will love not having to untangle them when I take them out of my work bag. For the price you can't beat the quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. South

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of altec lansing earbuds for about 6 months, always tangled till the point of breaking the cord near the left bud, I was looking for a solution when I saw someone on a train on my way home with a pair of Zipbuds pro next to me, I was sold, the zipper solved all my tangling problem, I ordered a pair in a blink, I was suprised to know they sound WAY BETTER than I expected, crisp clear sound, I am very very satisfied with these, my brother and best friend are about to order theirs already!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Nunez

customer_reviews.title: The handle on the zipper sometimes are twisted to the ...
customer_reviews.text: The handle on the zipper sometimes are twisted to the side so it takes some fiddling and work to get it straight again so i can actually open and use it. At those times, it takes just as long to get this one out and ready as any other tangled headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Hans O Karlsson

customer_reviews.title: Fairly high quality product for its price
customer_reviews.text: The Zipbuds mostly work as advertised. While it does cancel some noise it's not enough to really notice much of a difference between it and standard ear buds. In the right (or wrong setting) the zipper creates a large amount of noise if it scrapes against your clothes or bounces around from movement. I still occasionally have problems with tangles with all of the non-zipper parts.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: They love it. They claim good sound quality and really ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these earbuds for teenage boys. They love it. They claim good sound quality and really like the no tangle wires.
customer_reviews.author: GGto3

customer_reviews.title: Not good for running at all
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy. Always pulling down feel. Not good for running at all. The zipper part does not tangle and that was my reason for getting them. But I wont be using much unless I am sitting and watching a movie or something. But not good if you are moving around.
customer_reviews.author: DeeS

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty great headphones. They sound great, the mic is awesome. And they also dont tangle! The only reason I gave 4 stars is because they are slightly heavy. But not like rip out of my ears heavy. Overall im glad with my purchase and am buying a pair for my fiance.
customer_reviews.author: flngirl95

customer_reviews.title: Yep...they zip!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy headphones that do exactly what they say, they zip up. That said, I find myself having them unzipped most of the time, so not sure these were the right ear buds for me. Also, they are heavier than regular earbuds because of the zip, so not good for jogging I found. All in all, they are decent earbuds, but probably not what I was looking for, and certainly not worth the extra cost for me. One plus I will add...my cats have a tendency to chew on my earbuds when I am not looking...I'm betting these just might last a bit longer in that regard!
customer_reviews.author: sck

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound and Hardy Construction
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice, for a change, to have ear buds that don't feel like they will fall apart any minute. The sound is great and the ear inserts comfortable. And a super added bonus is that the 3.5 mm insert that goes into my phone jack is so slender that it fits in with my Mophie case on it - I was looking everywhere for an adapter to fit when this case is on and I don't need it anymore - this fits on its own. Love it!@
customer_reviews.author: Anne C. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept, good execution
customer_reviews.text: I had to have a pair of these when I saw the ones my mom got. I was a little worried, though, because those types of earbuds never work for me even when they have different sizes. These did come with rubber-thingys (what is the correct terminology for those, anyway?) that you could change out, but the ones that came already on the headphones actually worked for me just fine. Aside from the tangle-free thing, that's probably my favorite part about these. Oh, and the noise cancelling feature works surprisingly considering these are earbuds. Bottom line: I definitely recommend if you're in the market for new headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 5 Months
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased these on Amazon but ended up returning them because I found them much cheaper at Target On August 9th 2017. The sound was awesome and we're very comfortable easy to wear in storage. But on Feb 8 2018 the last ear bud went out, kinda. I have to hold the wire at a certain angle in order for it to work . It sucks because I really liked these earbuds especially the sound.
customer_reviews.author: LaSoldier505

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Very very impressed with these earbuds. Tangle free is absolutely the truth. The sound is superior to other earbuds that have a much higher price. I've been looking for a good product at a good price and these fulfill both.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J.

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: The entire experience with the whole transaction has been great. The product arrived exactly when promised in excellent packaging. The sound quality of the earbuds was awesome. They are impossible to tangle and they work quite well with my S3 and my Kindle Fire HD. Glad I made the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MotorChick

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and great design!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted and needed a set of ear buds to listen to my music unobtrusively in various situations. Good sound and comfort were most important in the product I wanted. Tangled wires were just a unfortunate hassle of the usual product. Now when I read about the Zipbuds Zipper Earbuds I was intrigued yet skeptical. Lo and behold the sound was great, the buds were comfortable, and the zipper design was ingenious! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Michael G. McGinnis

customer_reviews.title: Zipbuds failure
customer_reviews.text: Sound is OK. Cord is no good and only one side works now. Hardly ever used them and plan on getting a new pair but not these ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt C. Stickney

customer_reviews.title: Look great and work as intended
customer_reviews.text: Just got these babies in the mail today and they are just as good as everybody says. I can't ever see these get tangled. The audio is great and the "Electric Yellow" is an awesome workout color. My only con is that they are a little heavier than regular ear buds but not a crazy amount just enough to make you notice. I'm sure you'll get used to the added weight. Overall I recommend these ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Shifted Reality

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I had never heard of Zipbuds before but after reading so many positive reviews and not having great success with other brands I decided to give them a shot. I have had them for a couple days now and I am very very impressed. The sound quality is on par with other top brands. The bass is very good as well which is good when listening to music during a workout for me. One of the best traits is their unique design which helps them never get tangled. Highly recommend. Only critque is I would get rid of the pull for the zipper it kind of flops around, without it you could still slide the zipper up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas McEachin

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: just ok. sound quality is fine. they are a bit heavy overall because of the zipper. the fit is ok, though there is a spot where it hits my ear externally that causes fatigue upon longer listening. there are so many headphones out there that you can find something better in this price range. the tangle free idea is cool but overall probably not work the tradeoffs
customer_reviews.author: Coler Alred

customer_reviews.title: Great Innovation
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the durability of the zipper, but have to say that it appears to be well engineered. The sound quality, especially the bass is also excellent. I usually keep my headsets in my pant pocket because I take them in and out often and putting them back into a case is inconvenient and the case itself it too bulky to carry around. With these headsets I don't have to spend time to untangle them every time.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Stupendous!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, stylish, excellent sound reproduction and the zipper is brilliant! A very nice microphone makes phone answering a pleasure. Noise isolation is better than average. Will recommend to friends and family! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: heldmyw

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks of use there is still no tangle. So far, very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Notes 88

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't tangle, but poor quality earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: One of the ear buds doesn't work anymore- so i can hear only in one ear! It's a good product that doesn't get tangled, but a real shame that the earbuds gave out within a few months of use! I'd expect better quality for this kind of money.
customer_reviews.author: Radhika Annadata

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good.
customer_reviews.text: Stays in my ears... Just make sure you read which earbud is left & which is right. Good call quality and decent sound quality when listening to music. The zipper is a little heavy, but you get use to it.
customer_reviews.author: Lil Goose

customer_reviews.title: Just What I've Been Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: This is a dream product for those of us who have struggled to untangle earbuds. The quality of this product is heavy duty and durable. It also delivers dynamite sound and is incredibly comfortable to wear. This is the answer to your tangled dreams!
customer_reviews.author: kleaspop

customer_reviews.title: Sound great. Heads don't pivot.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality delivered by these buds is phenomenal. Just what I was looking for. However, I thought the ear-insert part rotated to fit from any angle. That's not the case. At any rate, these buds are FAR superior to anything I've used. And I have gotten used to the non-rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Daley

product_meta.title: Zipbuds - PRO mic Never Tangle Zipper Earbuds with Noise Canceling Mic/Remote - Black
product_meta.description:
Zipbuds PRO mic - Matte Black Zipbuds PRO mic - Matte Black SICK OF TANGLED EARBUDS? WE'VE GOT YOU COVERED.
Anyone familiar with the painstaking process of untangling earbuds can relate. Relief has finally arrived! Featuring our patented NEVER Tangle Zipper Cabling, Zipbuds PRO mic provides an extra edge in both style and function. ComfortFit2 Technology + rubberized (slip resistant) coating means our earbuds stay in your ears. To top it off, the in-line noise cancelling mic/remote will keep you in touch with clear voice pick up in any environment.

4TH GENERATION PATENTED ZIPPER CABLING - NEVER TANGLES
Zipbuds are manufactured specifically to eliminate tangled cables. Protected by multiple utility and design patents, the unique design is critically acclaimed to be the solution to your tangled cables. The concept is simple; seamlessly combine earbuds and zippers to make one superior product. The 4th Generation of Zipbuds are the best sounding, lightest, and most comfortable earbuds available today.

ZBX HIGH PERFORMANCE DRIVERS – SOUND THAT INSPIRES
The 11mm ZBX high performance drivers have been precision tuned for a dynamic listening experience. Zipbuds’ ComfortFit2 earbud design is angled for a secure and comfortable fit that ensures optimal driver positioning. ComfortFit2 Technology combined with the rubberized (slip resistant) coating makes sure Zipbuds PRO mic earbuds will stay in your ears.

IN-LINE NOISE CANCELLING MIC/REMOTE – STAY CONNECTED
Your calls will sound clearer than ever thanks to the noise cancelling mic/remote. A reliable microphone that can handle pretty much anything you throw at it: answer a call, activate voice controls, pause or skip a song, all without taking your smart device out of your pocket.

#LiveTangleFree ZIPBUDS PRO MIC FEATURES:
 * 4th Gen. Zipbuds Patented Zipper Cabling 
 * ZBX High Performance Drivers 
 * Noise-Canceling Mic/Remote 
 * ComfortFit2 Technology: Stays in Your Ears 
 * Case-Friendly Aluminum 3.5mm Plug

YOUR EARBUDS DON'T NEED TO TANGLE. GREAT SOUND DOESN'T HAVE TO COST YOU A FORTUNE.
Zipbuds PRO mic is available in both Matte Black and Electric Yellow.

Which Zipbuds are right for you?$24.99JUICED 2.0$39.99PRO mic4th Gen. Patented Zipper Cabling✓✓ComfortFit2 Technology✓✓Case-Friendly 3.5mm Plug✓✓Includes 3 Custom Ear Tip Sizes✓✓ZBX High Performance Drivers✓In-Line Noise Canceling Mic/Remote✓Chromed Aluminum Accents✓Rubberized (non-slip) Coating✓
feature_bullets: 4th Generation Patented Zip buds Cabling: seamlessly combine earbuds and zippers to make one superior product that never tangles
ComfortFit2 angled earbud design provides a secure and comfortable fit that maintains optimal driver positioning. Better fit - Better sound. Includes 3 Custom Ear Tip Sizes
Immersive listening experience powered by Zipbuds Premium 11mm ZBX high performance drivers
Noise Canceling Mic/Remote for hands-free calling and clearer sounding calls
Earbuds that survive your lifestyle: Military-Grade fibers for lasting durability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars592 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
